text: Cecropia pastasana is a species of tree in the family Urticaceae. It is native to Colombia, Ecuador and Peru. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests and subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== pastasana Category:Near threatened plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Trees of Peru Category:Trees of Ecuador Category:Trees of Colombia
title: Cecropia pastasana
